result.reason: The issue combines multiple old enhancement requests without a current-version repro or clear expected behavior, so it is not actionable yet.
result.approach: Request retest on v1.79.x and split into two reproducible asks: bulk connection creation/launch workflow and immediate inline rename when adding a new connection.
